note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Share of the population in poverty vs. Electoral Democracy Index
subtitle: Poverty is defined as living on less than $10 a day. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. The electoral democracy index is by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), based on expert estimates, and ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
